flowchart.name: Application Structure Flowchart
flowchart.description: This flowchart illustrates the hierarchical structure of the application, showing the main components and their relationships.

flowchart.name: Data Flow Flowchart
flowchart.description: This flowchart visualizes the flow of data within the application, showing how data is generated, processed, and passed between different components.

flowchart.name: Service Interaction Flowchart
flowchart.description: This flowchart focuses on the interaction between the different services in the application, outlining the steps involved in connecting to the respective services and passing data.

flowchart.name: User Interface Flowchart
flowchart.description: This flowchart depicts the user interface (UI) interactions in the application, illustrating the different screens, input boxes, and buttons.

flowchart.name: Testing Flowchart
flowchart.description: This flowchart outlines the testing process for the application, including the different test cases and their dependencies.

flowchart.name: Utility Functions Flowchart
flowchart.description: This flowchart focuses on the utility functions in the application, illustrating the different utility functions and their relationships.

sequence_diagram.name: User Interaction Sequence
sequence_diagram.description: Shows the sequence of interactions between the user interface (UI) and the application components.

sequence_diagram.name: Data Generation Sequence
sequence_diagram.description: Illustrates the flow of data generation and processing, including steps like retrieving data, applying data algorithms, and generating outputs.

sequence_diagram.name: Service Integration Sequence
sequence_diagram.description: Depicts the interaction between the application services and external APIs or libraries.

sequence_diagram.name: Configuration Sequence
sequence_diagram.description: Shows how the application loads and processes configuration settings.

sequence_diagram.name: Testing Sequence
sequence_diagram.description: Illustrates the sequence of steps involved in executing tests.

sequence_diagram.name: Logging Sequence
sequence_diagram.description: Depicts the flow of logging activities within the application.

sequence_diagram.name: File Handling Sequence
sequence_diagram.description: Shows the sequence of steps involved in file handling operations.
